column1: pdf printable version facts. born: june 5, 1944. death: june 10, 2015. survivors. beatrice montoya ozuna, mother; robert b. holland, gilbert b. holland, edward b. holland, rachel montoya cantu, rosendo montoya, lillie montoya olivarri, christina montoya hurtado, gilbert montoya, felix montoya, alex montoya, and mother figure to numerous relatives and family friends; and oscar ozuna, brother preceded in death by. luis ozuna, father; and juanita m. ozuna, aunt services. visitationsunday june 14, 2015, 5:00 p. m. at vinyard funeral home chapel rosary. sunday june 14, 2015, 7:00 p. m. at vinyard funeral home chapel funeral. monday june 15, 2015, 2:00 p. m. mass at sacred heart catholic church interment. monday june 15, 2015 at montoya cemetery memorial networks partner provider: batesville interactive, all rights reserved. funeral home website by batesville, inc. privacy terms of use
